name: markdownlint-cli2
description: A fast, flexible, configuration-based command-line interface for linting Markdown/CommonMark files with the `markdownlint` library

scripts.build-container: VERSION=$(node -e "process.stdout.write(require('./package.json').version)") && docker build -t davidanson/markdownlint-cli2:$VERSION -f docker/Dockerfile . && docker tag davidanson/markdownlint-cli2:$VERSION davidanson/markdownlint-cli2:latest
scripts.lint-watch: git ls-files | entr npm run lint
scripts.publish-container: VERSION=$(node -e "process.stdout.write(require('./package.json').version)") && docker push davidanson/markdownlint-cli2:$VERSION && docker push davidanson/markdownlint-cli2:latest
scripts.test: ava test/append-to-array-test.js test/markdownlint-cli2-test.js test/markdownlint-cli2-test-exec.js test/markdownlint-cli2-test-main.js test/merge-options-test.js test/resolve-and-require-test.js
scripts.test-watch: git ls-files | entr npm run test
